sect2.title: Move to Screen
sect2.para: The Move to Screen submenu allows to display GIMP on a different screen connected to your device.

listitem.para:
You can access this submenu from the main menu through
View Move to Screen .

sect3.title: Contents of the Move to Screen submenu

listitem.para: This is an experimental functionality to choose a different display.
The exact name of the menu entry depends on the display server software of your operating system (for example Screen wayland-0 on a Linux system running Wayland).
If more than one screen is listed, you can select a different screen on which you want GIMP to be shown.
